note.p: Daughter of John Rotherham, watch manufacturer of Warwick, and his wife Eliza. Married Thomas Purdie in Coventry, Warwickshire, in 1878.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3177/78/13)
Scotland, national probate index (calendar of confirmations and inventories), 1876–1936 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 January 2018)
Warwickshire Anglican registers (Engl/2/1232 and Engl 09000 34) (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 January 2018).
